experience.title: My Experience
experience.subtitle: Discover my professional journey and the projects I worked on

optimgov.description: Design and development of an internal telephony management module for the municipality of Marrakech. This module integrates into the municipality's global information system and aims to optimize internal communication and telephone service management.
missions: Analysis of the detailed functional specifications document
Design and UML modeling (use cases, classes, sequences)
Development of statistical dashboards and automation of certain tasks
Participation in various Agile methodology ceremonies (Scrum)

oncf.description: Development of an automated dashboard for tracking ticket sales.
missions: Monitoring and exploitation of indicators provided by the company (KPI)
Design and implementation of an interactive dashboard
Generation of fictitious data to preserve confidentiality

cmais.description: Discovery of data analysis methods and initiation to quality control practices within the framework of market studies.
missions: Observation of the data collection and validation process
Simple verification of data consistency (e.g. comparison of expected/actual values)
Participation in the preparation of reports and summaries

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover the projects I developed during my academic journey

project1.title: PFA Management Platform
project1.description: Development of a complete platform for managing End-of-Year Projects (PFA) with an intuitive user interface and real-time tracking system.

project2.title: Desktop Application - Library Management
project2.description: Distributed desktop application for comprehensive library management with a lending system, user management, and book inventory.

project3.title: Stock Management Website - Parapharmacy
project3.description: Web application for managing a parapharmacy's stock with product tracking, low stock alerts, and report generation.
